short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify Glo3D integration with "Cars For Sale" Inventory Management System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a FREE extension for “Glo3D.com” and “Cars For Sale” mutual customers to integrate Glo3D and “Cars For Sale” platforms. 
Using this extension, with just one click, you can import your photos to your “Cars For Sale” account right from your “Cars For Sale” panel.
How to use:
1. (Only the first time) Download the Glo3D.com Extension.
2. (Only the first time) Log in to your Glo3D account.
3. While on your “Cars For Sale” Vehicle page, click on the extension and click on download.
4. Click on "Upload" open the downloaded image folder and choose the image/images you like to upload.

We are adding new features such as downloading video tours SOON.
